headline: 3 Top Growth Stocks to Buy in the Second Half of 2025
summary: Amazon could hold up better than many expect if steep tariffs remain in place.  Meta Platforms should benefit from multiple AI tailwinds.  Vertex Pharmaceuticals has two new drugs on the market, with more potentially on the way.
